li.label: Eternal Youth
li.description: Those possessing eternal youth will never age, though can still succumb to injury.

li.label: Incomplete Immortal
li.description: This form of immortality allows an individual to survive all manner of injury, but does not prevent them from dying of old age.

li.label: Immortal
li.description: Immortals cannot die by mortal means. They will never succumb to age nor injury.
